author: Rebecca Shabad
title: Fauci: 'I don't understand' why all states are not under stay-at-home orders
description: Dr. Anthony Fauci suggested Thursday night that all people in the U.S. should be under a stay-at-home order to mitigate the spread of the coronavirus disease across the country.
content:
WASHINGTON Dr. Anthony Fauci suggested Thursday night that all Americans should be under a stay-at-home order to mitigate the spread of the coronavirus, and that all states should be operating under the same guidelines.
I don't understand why that's not happ… [+1542 chars]
